name: hikarujs
description: A static site generator that generates routes based on directories naturally.

scripts.build:docs: rm -r docs/* && jsdoc -c .jsdoc.json -R README.md -u tutorials/ && echo "hikaru.alynx.one" > docs/CNAME && touch docs/.nojekyll && git add -A docs/ && git commit -m "Updated docs."
scripts.test: standardx bin/*.js hikaru/*.js tests/*.js && mocha tests/index.js

author: Alynx Zhou <alynx.zhou@gmail.com> (https://alynx.one/)
